name: Ramada Grand Forks

reviews.text: Once again, I found myself packing up the wife and kids, and traveling to Grand Forks, ND. I remember trips many years ago, staying at a hotel as a kid with my parents in the brand new Ramada Inn in Grand Forks. Many years later, I took my kids to see the hotel their dad stayed in as a kid.
reviews.title: Definately showing it's age!

likes.disliked: — hotel is starting to look old, and dingy at the pool area!

reviews.title: Best Kept Hotel in Grand Forks
reviews.text: Actually for an older hotel, this Ramada is in surprisingly good shape. Some decor is dated. Some of the signs and fixtures look astonishingly like they once did when I was a kid.

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.text: We stayed 2 nights in along the poolside. Here is our experience.

aka: Ramada Grand Forks Hotel Grand Forks
